results.description: AC Milan sign Algeria midfielder Ismael Bennacer from fellow Italian club Empoli for a reported Â£14.5m.

results.title: AC Milan sign Ismael Bennacer from Empoli

results.description: Atalanta break an unwanted record in a remarkable draw with Empoli as they fail to score with 47 shots.
results.shortTitle: Atalanta fail to score with 47 shots
results.title: Atalanta fail to score with 47 shots in 0-0 draw with Empoli

results.description: Teenager Moise Kean comes off the bench to score as Juve edge past Empoli and now need just 13 points for an eighth straight Serie A title.
results.title: Juventus 1-0 Empoli

results.description: Follow live text commentary, best image and social media as Juventus play Empoli in Serie A after Barcelona beat Espanyol
results.title: Serie A: Juventus v Empoli

results.description: Claudio Ranieri makes a winning return as Roma boss as his side beat Empoli at home in their Serie A fixture.
results.shortTitle: Ranieri wins first game back at Roma
results.title: Roma 2-1 Empoli: Claudio Ranieri wins first game since returning to Serie A side

results.description: AC Milan's Krzysztof Piatek continues his excellent goalscoring season with his seventh goal in six games as his side beat Empoli.
results.shortTitle: Piatek scores again as Milan beat Empoli
results.title: AC Milan 3-0 Empoli: Krzysztof Pi atek scores again as Rossoneri win

results.description: Dries Mertens scores a hat-trick as Napoli thrash Empoli to move into second place in Serie A.
results.shortTitle: Mertens scores hat-trick in Napoli win
results.title: Napoli 5-1 Empoli: Dries Mertens scores hat-trick in comfortable win

results.description: Cristiano Ronaldo scores twice as unbeaten Serie A leaders Juventus come from behind to beat struggling Empoli.
results.shortTitle: Ronaldo scores twice in Juve comeback win
results.title: Empoli 1-2 Juventus: Cristiano Ronaldo scores twice in comeback win

results.description: Cristiano Ronaldo is expected to start as unbeaten Juventus visit Serie A strugglers Empoli - follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Empoli v Juventus - Ronaldo scores twice in comeback
results.title: Empoli v Juventus live in Serie A

results.description: Genoa fans watch 43 minutes of their home match with Empoli in silence in tribute to the Morandi bridge disaster victims.
results.shortTitle: Silent Genoa fans make Morandi tribute
results.title: Morandi bridge disaster: Genoa fans watch home match in silence in tribute

results.description: Leeds United defender Giuseppe Bellusci seeks a move away from the Championship club following his loan spell with Empoli.
results.title: Giuseppe Bellusci: Leeds United defender seeking a transfer following Empoli loan

results.description: Edin Dzeko scores twice against Empoli as Roma cut Juventus' lead at the top of Serie A to five points.
results.title: Roma 2-0 Empoli

thumbnail.altText: Edin Dzeko celebrates scoring for Roma against Empoli

results.description: Live text commentary, the latest images and social media interaction from Serie A as Juventus host Empoli.
results.title: Serie A: Juventus v Empoli

results.description: Serie A leaders Juventus score three goals in five minutes to secure a comfortable victory over strugglers Empoli.
results.title: Empoli 0-3 Juventus

results.description: Live text coverage of Espanyol v Real Madrid after Joe Hart keeps a clean sheet on his home debut for Torino and Inter Milan beat Juventus.
